Emerge {2}{U}{B} [i](You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.)[/i]
Target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-4 until end of turn.
If you’ve sacrificed a creature this turn, draw a card.
